translation.en: ♪ I never used to take it slow ♪ ♪ Now I feel the air And take the long way home ♪
Okay, let's get you a little bit more... about there. You look great.
translation.ja: ちょっと立ち位置を 調整しますよ

translation.en: Okay, folks. Let's hold it right there.
translation.ja: 完璧です 動かないで
仕事だ こっちは伝統よ

translation.en: It's August! - I don't get the rush! -
translation.ja: まだ８月だ　焦らなくても

translation.en: Well, we have to send out the Christmas cards the first week of December,
translation.ja: 12月上旬には カードを出すのに―

translation.en: and we only have Luke for another day before he goes to college.
translation.ja: ルークは明日から大学の寮よ

translation.en: You guys could just Photoshop me in.
translation.ja: 僕は加工で合成してよ
僕は加工で合成してよ いい感じです

translation.en: - Awesome. - There you go. We good?
- - Yeah. I am in the car. Can you just hold a sec?
translation.ja: 車なんだ　待ってくれ

translation.en: - What's Nelson's wife's name again? - Terry.
- Terry. - And Lola's in law school, and Jake just got married.
translation.ja: テリーよ 娘は法科大学院で息子は新婚

translation.en: Yeah, Lola a lawyer, and Jake just married?
translation.ja: 娘は弁護士で息子は結婚？

translation.en: Hey, have a good day, guys.
So that's it, huh? Tomorrow you've got an empty nest.
translation.ja: いよいよ明日には ルークが巣立つのね

translation.en: Yes. And I was thinking, you know, with Luke out of the house, maybe I should go back to work.
translation.ja: だから また働くのも いいかなと思って

translation.en: Well, you always did love being a vet.
Who says you've gotta re- enter the workforce anyway?
Well, I do! I mean, what else am I gonna do?
translation.ja: 他にすることもないし
有閑マダムのランチに

translation.en: - The ladies who lunch. - Thank you.
- - You guys, don't ever call us that again.
translation.ja: そんな呼び方 やめて

translation.en: Trunk's almost full. This is the last load.
translation.ja: これを積んだら終わりだ
入れたよ　歯磨き粉も

translation.en: Thanks so much for letting me drive him.
translation.ja: 車で送れてうれしいです

translation.en: Aw. I'm sure you have a lot to talk about.
translation.ja: いろいろ話もあるでしょ

translation.en: And you be careful on the road, okay?
- You good to go, kiddo? - Yup! We're outta here!
translation.ja: 忘れ物は？ ない　もう行くよ
ダメよ　約束したでしょ

translation.en: This is the last time, though.
Oh, come on! Surely it's not the last time!
translation.ja: ひどいわ そんなこと言わないで
ひどいわ そんなこと言わないで 大きくなって

translation.en: Remember what you used to tell me, that I could be an astronaut, or the president of the United States?
translation.ja: 言ってただろ 大統領も夢じゃないって

translation.en: Well, how's that supposed to happen if I stay here?
translation.ja: 家にいたら なれない

translation.en: It's just something that parents tell their children.
translation.ja: 親はそういうこと言うの

translation.en: Come on. Let him get on the road before it gets dark.
translation.ja: 暗くなる前に出発させよう
〝２０１９年８月31日〞 成績優秀なら 来年は うちで研修だ

translation.en: and next summer you'll intern at the firm.
translation.ja: 成績優秀なら 来年は うちで研修だ

translation.en: Okay, so we are gonna FaceTime everyday, right?
translation.ja: 毎日 ビデオチャットを

translation.en: - Once a week. I love you guys. -
translation.ja: 週１回にして じゃあね

translation.en: I'll eat, I'll breathe, I'll even wear a sweater. Don't worry.
translation.ja: 食べるし 呼吸もするし セーターも着る

translation.en: I know you'll be okay, I just-- I love you so much.
translation.ja: 愛してるから心配なの
息子は無事 巣立った

translation.en: and I know we haven't been spending a lot of time alone, and I know things aren't great,
translation.ja: 久しぶりだし 最近ギクシャクしてた

translation.en: so I booked us to go on our second honeymoon.
translation.ja: だから２回目のハネムーンに
ケイト アフリカよ！

translation.en: Look, I-- I waited until Luke was gone because I didn't want to upset him...
translation.ja: ルークが行くまではと 黙ってたんだが…

translation.en: Why?  What's wrong? Are you sick?
- Well, no one's happy all the time. - Kate...
translation.ja: 人生いろいろある ケイト

translation.en: I'm not in love with you anymore.
And I'm pretty sure you feel the same.
I'll be at the Carlyle if you need to reach me.
translation.ja: カーライルに滞在する

translation.en: I don't understand, I don't understand.
translation.ja: 待って　どういうこと？

translation.en: Are you involved with someone else?
So, you're just leaving me like this with-- with no discussion?
translation.ja: 話し合いもせずに 出ていくの？

translation.en: We had a lot of good years.
I think in the long run, you'll see this is better for both of us.
translation.ja: これでよかったと 思える時が来る
私だけ 行きましょう
“コンラッド夫妻” 「アフリカの諸言語」

translation.en: Dinner for two. It's part of the meal plan.
translation.ja: ２人分の ディナー付きプランです

translation.en: Could I have another one of these, please?
- ♪ Making me feel all right ♪ - Hey, gorgeous.
- How're ya doing? - Derek, welcome back.
translation.ja: 元気？ あら デレク

translation.en: - I hope you bring cash this time. - My IOU's aren't good enough anymore?
translation.ja: 現金なら 借用書じゃダメ？

translation.en: Why are you asking questions you're afraid of the answer to?
translation.ja: 分かってるくせに聞くな
どうも　褒め言葉ね

translation.en: Oh, it's Mr. and Mrs. Conrad.
I take it Mr. Conrad won't be joining us?
What, did he fall down a well?
Do you actually want to know where Mr. Conrad is?
- Uh-- - Two days ago, he told me that our marriage was over.
Two hours ago, I landed here
translation.ja: ２時間前 ２度目のハネムーンに来た

translation.en: on what was supposed to be our second honeymoon, by myself.
translation.ja: ２時間前 ２度目のハネムーンに来た １人でね

translation.en: In two weeks, I will be in a lawyer's office, trying to get back the decades I spent
translation.ja: ２週間後には 失った20年の代償を請求する

translation.en: putting him through grad school, raising our son,
translation.ja: 夫を進学させ 息子を育て 顧客をもてなし―

translation.en: entertaining his clients, and somehow becoming one of the ladies who lunch.
translation.ja: 夫を進学させ 息子を育て 顧客をもてなし― 気づいたら有閑マダムに

translation.en: Is there anything else that you would like to know?
I was just wondering if you were gonna eat all that food
- Thank you! - ♪ Feel it in the air ♪
You have lost your touch, my friend!
But I thought it was supposed to be a...
translation.ja: でも このツアーは…

translation.en: - Oh, you're the pilot. - For today.
translation.ja: パイロット？ 今日はね
「スター･トレック」の 船長さ

translation.en: Because we do boldly go where no tourist has gone before.
translation.ja: “人類未踏の地”に 飛ぶからな

translation.en: Two L's, in case you want to write my name down on a complaint form.
translation.ja: 苦情を出す時に 名前が要るだろ
分かったわ では 奥様

translation.en: Kate. Is that short for Katherine?
translation.ja: ケイト… キャサリンの愛称？

translation.en: So I thought it was good luck to name your plane after a woman.
translation.ja: 飛行機には女性名では？

translation.en: - Actually it's a woman you love. -
translation.ja: 厳密には愛する女の名

translation.en: Truth is, this one was already named Kira when I got her, so I only had to paint over one letter.
translation.ja: 買った時は“キラ(ＫＩＲＡ)”で １字塗り変えた

translation.en: It's about a 40- minute flight. - - to the lodge.
Don't let the name lodge fool you. You'll be surrounded by five- star luxury.
translation.ja: ロッジと言っても 実際には５つ星クラスだ

translation.en: - - Lusaka traffic, Cessna Mike India Alpha, East tie- down, departing runway 35, Lusaka.
translation.ja: こちらＭＩＡ 35番滑走路から離陸

translation.en: We're flying over the oldest and largest game Reserve in Africa, home of the big five.
translation.ja: アフリカ最古で 最大の動物保護区だ

translation.en: Lion, leopard, rhino, cape buffalo, elephant.
translation.ja: ライオン ヒョウ サイ バッファロー ゾウ
ほら バッファローだ

translation.en: Some people say it's the most dangerous animal out here.
translation.ja: 一番危険な動物と 言われるが―

translation.en: Hang on a minute. I'm gonna make a stop.
translation.ja: 悪いが 着陸するぞ

translation.en: I need you to stay in the plane.
Stay here?  What if you don't come back?
- It's Derek. You read me? - Yes.
translation.ja: デレクだ　聞こえる？

translation.en: We have an orphan five kilometers southwest of N'goma.
translation.ja: ああ 母を失った子ゾウを発見

translation.en: You'll find us just north of where I landed the airplane. We'll need a truck.
translation.ja: 着陸地点のすぐ北に来てくれ
密猟者に母親を殺された

translation.en: If we don't do something to help that baby, he'll be dead in two days.
translation.ja: このままじゃ２日で死ぬ

translation.en: I need you to talk to him, stay right in front of him, keep his attention.
translation.ja: 正面から話しかけて 注意を引いてくれ

translation.en: All right? Just be calm. It's gonna be all right.
translation.ja: じっとしてて　心配ないわ
怖がらなくていいのよ

translation.en: We gotta get him on his side, so he doesn't charge us. I got this.
translation.ja: 暴れないよう横にする

translation.en: - Let me help! - I've got it.
Okay. I'll keep him calm, get some water out of my backpack.
translation.ja: リュックの水をあげて

translation.en: He needs to know that we're here to help him.
Nobody in the world needs ivory, except an elephant.
translation.ja: 象牙はゾウのものなのに

translation.en: What's going to happen to him?
We'll take him back to the shelter and nurse him back to health.
translation.ja: 保護施設で面倒を見る

translation.en: We didn't have great luck with the last one, but he looks like he's in a little better shape.
translation.ja: 前回は残念だったが この子は救えるかも

translation.en: Let's get you to the lodge.
translation.ja: じゃ ロッジに行こう

translation.en: You'll be sipping martinis before sunset.
translation.ja: 日没前の１杯に間に合う

translation.en: Listen, I know this is very emotional, but there's nothing you can do.
translation.ja: 気持ちは分かるが 君には何もできない

translation.en: I haven't practiced in a while, and I mostly worked on dogs and cats, but I really want to help.
translation.ja: 診てたのは犬猫だったけど 助けたい

translation.en: What do you know about elephants?
It's gonna be okay. It's gonna be all right, little baby.
translation.ja: 大丈夫よ　元気になれるわ

translation.en: He's in shock. The grief of losing his family.
translation.ja: 家族を失って傷ついてる

translation.en: What can I do to help?
We have to make sure that he's hydrated and stays warm.
translation.ja: 水分を与えて体を温める

translation.en: We'll get this into his ear right here.
translation.ja: 耳のここに針を刺して

translation.en: If he doesn't get up in a day's time, he probably never will.
translation.ja: １日で立ち上がれなければ 絶望的だ

translation.en: We try and replicate life in the herd.
Each baby has a keeper, making sure they are never alone.
translation.ja: 子ゾウには飼育員をつける

translation.en: We also trade off, so the calves don't get too attached to one person, and vice versa.
translation.ja: 交代制で お互い 執着しすぎないようにしてる

translation.en: When the elephants are ready to leave the nursery, they spend their nights there,
translation.ja: 成長したら 夜は あそこに移す

translation.en: and at their own pace, which sometimes does take years,
translation.ja: 個体のペースに合わせて 環境に慣れさせ―

translation.en: they gradually make the transition back into the wild.
translation.ja: 野生に戻していくんだ

translation.en: And these are our living quarters, but most of us prefer to sleep with the elephants.
translation.ja: ここが宿舎だが みんなゾウと寝たがる

translation.en: How do the older elephants react to the babies you rescue?
translation.ja: 年上のゾウは 新入りを受け入れる？

translation.en: Right now we have three babies, four teenagers and three adults.
translation.ja: 今は子ゾウ３頭 若いゾウ４頭 大人が３頭

translation.en: She's practicing to be a matriarch.
- Wow. - Come on, Chuma! Move, move!
- She's very curious and very bossy. -
translation.ja: 好奇心旺盛で威張りん坊だ

translation.en: Well, Chuma, you have some New York in you!
Elephants have all the emotions of humans.
A sense of humor and a sense of family.
translation.ja: ユーモアや家族を愛し―

translation.en: - The children want attention, - and the teenagers rebel.
translation.ja: 幼児は親の気を引き 思春期の子は反抗的

translation.en: Come. It's almost suppertime for the little ones.
translation.ja: 行こう　子ゾウの夕食がある

translation.en: We feed the babies separately from the adults.
translation.ja: 大人とは離して給餌する

translation.en: That's Kasewe. We rescued him last week.
translation.ja: 先週 保護したカセウェ

translation.en: He's our oldest toddler. - Very demanding. -
translation.ja: 最年長の子ゾウでヤンチャだ

translation.en: Why don't you get some rest? This way.
The first tent on the end is yours, and we take supper in the boma.
translation.ja: 君のテントは一番奥だ 夕食はボマでとる

translation.en: Jonathan said the tent on the end.
translation.ja: 私のテントは一番奥だと

translation.en: The other end. This one's mine.
translation.ja: 向かいだ　これは俺のテント

translation.en: You mean, you live here, like, all the time?
translation.ja: あなた ここに住んでるの？

translation.en: Yeah, I fly the tourists to help us pay for the plane.
translation.ja: ああ　送迎はバイトさ

translation.en: Oh, I put your suitcase in your tent.
translation.ja: 君の荷物はテントに運んだ

translation.en: Forgive the mess. I'm not very good at folding.
translation.ja: 悪いが グチャグチャだ

translation.en: Kinda opened up when I threw it on the bed.
translation.ja: 弾みでカバンが開いた

translation.en: - So you just went through my stuff? - No.
But I don't think you're gonna need those high heels here.
translation.ja: いや だがハイヒールは要らない

translation.en: I don't want any more visitors.
No, no, no, no. Tell him that Leslie Van Der Mere- Jones called, exclamation point!
translation.ja: レスリー･ヴァンダー･ ミア=ジョーンズだと伝えて

translation.en: - These are beautiful! - Come on, grab a plate.
translation.ja: ステキな絵ね 皿を取って
よかった　明日も同じだ

translation.en: And if you stay long enough, the day after that, the day after that, and the day after that.
translation.ja: 長くいるなら 毎日 食べることに

translation.en: I don't know. I didn't really mean to, but...
translation.ja: 辞めたかったわけじゃない

translation.en: I guess-- I guess life just happened.
translation.ja: 成り行きでそうなった

translation.en: So you supported your husband through school, helped him build his business,
translation.ja: 夫を大学院に進学させて 仕事を支え―

translation.en: raised the kid, and then he left you?
translation.ja: 子育てしたのに捨てられた？

translation.en: Did I tell you all that?
And a lot about the ladies who lunch.
So you never get any of those type of surprises.
translation.ja: だから ある日突然―

translation.en: You don't wake up one day and someone doesn't love you anymore.
translation.ja: 突き放すようなことはしない

translation.en: Well, clearly, I'm with the wrong species.
translation.ja: 私は間違った動物といたのね

translation.en: I thought Africa was known for its good coffee.
translation.ja: コーヒーはアフリカ名物かと

translation.en: Your first time under the southern sky?

translation.ja: シリウスにカノープス…
アマチュア天文学の本よ

translation.en: We have a telescope at home
because Luke really loved it until he fell in love with music.
translation.ja: 息子は音楽にハマる前 星に夢中で

translation.en: What keeps them from coming into camp?
All right. Good night, New York.
translation.ja: おやすみ ニューヨーク

translation.en: Yup, tonight's my shift with the orphans.
translation.ja: ゾウの付き添い当番だ

translation.en: Next time, don't walk alone out there. It's not safe.
translation.ja: でも次は１人で出歩くな

translation.en: I mean, it's safe, but not so safe.
translation.ja: 安全だが 油断は禁物だ

translation.en: You have made me the happiest woman in the world!
translation.ja: あなたのおかげで 世界一 幸せよ

translation.en: Thank you! I hear that a lot.
translation.ja: よく そう言われる

translation.en: I think we're gonna need more milk.
Thirty- five pints a day. Wow.
Derek, you got a pick- up from the lodge. Private tour.
translation.ja: デレク ロッジに迎えを頼む

translation.en: Take good care of my elephant.

translation.ja: おなかがペコペコなんだね

translation.en: Nice to see you on your feet, young man!
translation.ja: 立ててよかったな おチビさん

translation.en: It appears that you have brought us good luck.
translation.ja: 先生が幸運を運んできた

translation.en: I did nothing. I did nothing.
I think this little calf would disagree.
translation.ja: この子は俺と同意見だ

translation.en: This is the biggest baby I've ever fed, definitely bigger than the last one.
translation.ja: こんなに大きな子の 授乳は初めて

translation.en: I do. I have a son.
Then we shall call this one Manu.
Oh, Manu, I hope you like your new name!
translation.ja: お名前 気に入った？

translation.en: How long have you lived with them?
My whole life, really. I grew up on the reserve.
Derek, too, pretty much. He moved here when he was 16.
translation.ja: デレクは16歳からここに

translation.en: Our fathers were game wardens together.
translation.ja: 親たちが猟区管理人でね
面倒な兄弟みたいなものだ

translation.en: I wish I could stay longer.
translation.ja: 私も長くここにいたい

translation.en: Oh, you know what? No one really calls me that.
translation.ja: 誰も先生なんて呼ばない

translation.en: Did you not earn the title?
The local vet comes around once a month, if we're lucky.
translation.ja: 地元の獣医は よくて月１回しか来ない
地元の獣医は よくて月１回しか来ない 常駐してほしい
ええ 分かってるわ

translation.en: You're hungry for your milk. I'll go get it.
- Good morning, Jonathan! - Good morning, Dr. Kate. Shift change.
translation.ja: おはよう ケイト先生　交代だ

translation.en: You know, I could stay a little longer.
translation.ja: もう少し いていい？

translation.en: Better not. We don't want him missing you. You are leaving tomorrow.
translation.ja: 情が移ると困る 明日には帰国だろ

translation.en: Your return ticket is for September 28th, right?
translation.ja: 帰りの飛行機は ９月28日では？

translation.en: Time flies when you're out here.
Lookin' at your fancy African vacay pics?
This Christmas. It was supposed to be our Christmas card.
translation.ja: 今年のカード用だった

translation.en: Hence the staged glamour of it all.
and you didn't get to go on your fancy five- star safari,
translation.ja: ５つ星のサファリに 行きそびれた

translation.en: let me take you on one.
- What are we talking, like, three? - Mm...
But with the value of five.
- Sometimes I come out here to paint. - Mm- hm.
...when they're old enough, - will start mingling with the wild herd. - Mm.
translation.ja: 成長したら 野生の群れに引き合わせる

translation.en: And then they might start staying out for one or two nights at a time.
translation.ja: そして１晩から慣らしていく

translation.en: Chuma over there has been wandering off. One night she's just gonna decide she's not coming home,
translation.ja: チューマは慣らし中だが 園に帰らないと決めたら―

translation.en: and from that time on, she'll be a wild elephant again.
translation.ja: その時から野生に戻る

translation.en: - Don't you get sad when they leave? - I used to.
But they're meant to live in the wild.
translation.ja: 寂しかったが ゾウのためだ

translation.en: It's the empty nest syndrome. I guess it's everywhere.
translation.ja: 巣立ちは どこも同じね

translation.en: My son just left for college.
In a dorm room one state over, but definitely wild.
translation.ja: 隣の州の寮にいるけど まさに野放し

translation.en: Just because we don't see them doesn't mean that they're not still a part of us.
translation.ja: 会えなくても 親の愛は変わらない

translation.en: I did. But it wasn't in the cards.
translation.ja: 望んでたが 恵まれなかった

translation.en: How long have you been divorced?
She had a gallery in town.
And then she got ill, and when she passed...

translation.ja: 俺は ここに戻った

translation.en: When you first get married, you think, Well, that's it. Everything is just gonna be fine now.
translation.ja: 結婚したら すべてうまくいくと思ってた

translation.en: Now I've gotta go back home, and I don't know what I'm supposed to do with myself.
translation.ja: 帰ったら 何をすればいいのかしら

translation.en: Taking a second honeymoon with myself?
- - Hey, Luke! Can you see me?
I'm good. How are you? How's school?
translation.ja: 元気よ　大学は楽しい？

translation.en: Well, I took a little detour, and now I'm in this place surrounded by wild animals.
translation.ja: ちょっと寄り道して 野生動物に囲まれてる

translation.en: I have chapati with tomato and goat cheese,
translation.ja: トマトとヤギのチーズを のせたチャパティ

translation.en: a.k.a. New York thin crust pizza.
translation.ja: 別名ニューヨーク風 薄焼きピザよ

translation.en: Now this makes me wanna be a lady who lunches.
translation.ja: 俺もマダムになりたい

translation.en: And I just wanna say to all of you, thank you,
translation.ja: みんなには感謝しきれないわ

translation.en: because these last few weeks have meant more to me than you can ever know.
translation.ja: かけがえのない 数週間を過ごせた
女性は ゾウと同じく―

translation.en: So even though I'm gonna be far away,
I want you to know that I'm never gonna forget any of you.
translation.ja: みんなのことは 絶対に忘れない

translation.en: You really have a telescope on the 15th floor?
The flickering lights of about a million TVs.
translation.ja: 星の数ほどのテレビの明かり

translation.en: Come on. I wanna show you something.
Oh, I've already seen your tent.
I think you were looking at more than the tent.
translation.ja: 別のものを見てただろ

translation.en: So, when you're at home, you can look through your telescope at all the fabulous televisions, but tonight...
translation.ja: テレビの明かりは 家でも見られるが―
今夜は あれを見て

translation.en: This is Leslie Van Der Mere- Jones. She's with the foundation
translation.ja: レスリー･ヴァンダー･ ミア=ジョーンズだ

translation.en: Well, it's late so I'm just going to head back to my tent.
translation.ja: もう遅いからテントに戻るわ

translation.en: I never met someone with five last names.
It's on me. I just should've stuck with my first impression.
translation.ja: あなたは 第一印象のままだった

translation.en: You're lonely but you don't know it,
so you just use all your thing
translation.ja: 魅力を武器に 欲しいものを手に入れる男

translation.en: to get what you need in the moment and you don't think about anybody else.
translation.ja: 魅力を武器に 欲しいものを手に入れる男 他人など お構いなし

translation.en: Well, someone doesn't want you to leave.
How long does it take her to pack?
- She's not going. - What do you mean?
Don't flatter yourself. It's not you.
He has a gray trunk, weighs 600 pounds
and he has a drinking problem.
Yeah, I guess I never saw that coming.
Dear Luke, I know I've exceeded my weekly FaceTime allotment,
translation.ja: ルークへ テレビ電話は 週１回の約束だから―

translation.en: so I'm writing this email to tell you that
translation.ja: メールで知らせるわね

translation.en: I have decided to stay out here a little longer.
translation.ja: もう少し ここに滞在します
愛してる　ママより

translation.en: - - ♪ Santa's coming to town, town ♪ ♪ And he's bringing joy For all the kids around, 'round ♪
♪ What took you so long? I needed you ♪
How are you today? Are you ready for your check- up?
translation.ja: 健康診断をしてもいい？

translation.en: Our families are almost here. Cheer up!
translation.ja: 家族が来る　元気出せ
来たら すぐ分かる

translation.en: But you will hear them. They are very loud.
translation.ja: 来たら すぐ分かる にぎやかなんだ

translation.en: I can't wait to meet them.
One day maybe we can meet your family, too.
translation.ja: 先生の家族にも会いたい

translation.en: Oh, that would be nice, but my son is gonna stay at college this year with his friends.
translation.ja: 息子は今年 大学の友達と過ごすみたい

translation.en: Dr. Kate, I realize that you're away from your family this Christmas,
translation.ja: ケイト先生 今年のクリスマスは 家族と会えなくても―

translation.en: but I want you to know that you're a part of ours now.
translation.ja: 先生は俺たちの家族だ

translation.en: Hello, my beautiful little princesses!  Daddy!
translation.ja: 来たな　俺のお姫様たち！

translation.en: Go say hi to Uncle Derek.
You guys have gotten so big.
Hey, I wrestle elephants for a living. You're just a little rabbit to me.
translation.ja: ゾウに比べたら何でもない

translation.en: Hi! Jonathan has written much about you.
So nice to finally meet you.
I'm Lulu, and this is my sister, Nia.
translation.ja: 私はルル　こっちは妹のニア

translation.en: Oh, you guys are adorable! Let's get some treats! Let's go!
translation.ja: まあ かわいい お菓子があるわよ

translation.en: - Hi, Derek! - Good to see you! How are you?
translation.ja: デレク 元気だった？

translation.en: Now you can look at this.
Ooh, I see this is a tent.
- Who are these? - Oh, this one is you.
translation.ja: これは？ こっちが先生

translation.en: - Oh! - And this one is Uncle Derek.
translation.ja: こっちがデレクおじさん

translation.en: Well, I like it, but there's just one problem.
translation.ja: そうなのね いいけど ちょっと直すわ

translation.en: Is that handsome fellow supposed to be me?
And why is he missing a hand?
Well, it isn't actually for me. - Well, you know, maybe just a little bit. -
translation.ja: 私のためじゃないけど 自分も欲しかった

translation.en: I see you've done this before.
Only about twice a day for the last 20 years.
- Mm? - From So- and- so and So- and- so Partners.
Oh, and did you read it, too?
- No, the envelope was too thick. -
- Hm. Does not look like a Christmas card. -
Mr. Conrad is filing for divorce.
translation.ja: 夫が離婚を申請してる

translation.en: I'm gonna go see my elephant.
He seems to be doing fine.
You know, I always wanted more animals, but Drew didn't want pet hair on his clothes.
translation.ja: ペットを飼いたかったけど 夫は嫌がってた

translation.en: I mean, I just should've seen this coming. I...
translation.ja: 早く気づけばよかった

translation.en: Without change, there would be no butterflies.
I gotta go check on those cookies.
translation.ja: クッキー 焼けたかしら
マヌがいない えっ？

translation.en: Chuma must've opened the gate somehow, Manu followed.
translation.ja: チューマについていったんだ

translation.en: - I'll fly out first light to look for him. - First light is too late.
translation.ja: 夜が明けたら捜す それじゃ遅すぎるわ

translation.en: - - Chuma will take care of him.
- They'll take care of each other. - You don't know that.
translation.ja: 助け合うさ 分からないわ

translation.en: Sometimes you gotta let them wander. It's their world out there.
translation.ja: いずれ野生に戻るし 自由も必要だ

translation.en: But he's still just a baby. Anything could happen.
Wait, what are you doing? Why are we stopping?
translation.ja: どうしてここで止まるの？

translation.en: We've been at this for a while. Need to get some sleep.
translation.ja: もう十分だ　少し眠らないと

translation.en: It's as good a place as any.
But shouldn't we keep looking for them?
I lost Luke one time in a shopping mall. Christmas time.
translation.ja: クリスマスの買い物中 ルークが迷子に

translation.en: Yeah, but there weren't any poachers in that mall.
translation.ja: でも店に密猟者はいない

translation.en: Looks like you put on some pounds.
- Was smaller than Manu when I found him. -
We didn't think he'd make it.
How long have you known him?
What's it been, Roi? Nine, almost ten years?
I remember once Jonathan's father walked into the park, an elephant came out of the bush to greet him.
translation.ja: ジョナサンの父に ゾウが会いに来たことがある

translation.en: It'd been 37 years since they'd seen each other.
It was so nice to meet you!

translation.ja: レンジャーがゾウを発見

translation.en: They're at that pond south of Kadma.
Now this is a merry Christmas Eve!
translation.ja: いいクリスマスイブになった

translation.en: Hey, Derek. Got a last- minute pick- up for ya. - Come on back. -
translation.ja: デレク 迎えの依頼が入った

translation.en: Well, it's not Christmas in Africa without goat stew.
translation.ja: ヤギのシチューは欠かせない

translation.en: It's a well- known fact that a man cannot resist a good goat stew.
translation.ja: 男を落とすには 胃袋をつかめと言うでしょ

translation.en: I hear your friend Derek loves a good goat stew.
translation.ja: ヤギのシチューは デレクの大好物よ

translation.en: - He and I, we're-- we're just friends. - Hm.
translation.ja: 彼とは その… 友達だから
本当に ただの友達よ

translation.en: - Derek needs you at the air strip. - Why? Is he okay?
translation.ja: デレクが 何かあった？

translation.en: He's fine. But it is important.
translation.ja: 無事だが 急用らしい

translation.en: I picked you up a little holiday cheer for Christmas Eve.
translation.ja: イブにふさわしいものを 運んだ

translation.en: Figured I'd check on you, make sure you're wearing a sweater.
translation.ja: セーター着てるか見に来た

translation.en: Pleasure to meet Dr. Kate's first son.
Dr. Kate? And I'm her only son.
translation.ja: 先生？　僕は１人息子だ

translation.en: What are you even doing here?
- He did? - Mm- hm. What about that music festival?
Yeah, we had to drop out. My finals schedule screwed everything up.
translation.ja: 期末試験のせいで棄権した

translation.en: All right, I'm gonna take this stuff back to the tent,
translation.ja: 荷物は運ぶから 積もる話をどうぞ

translation.en: so you guys can catch up. Next time you fly, one hand on the yoke.
translation.ja: 荷物は運ぶから 積もる話をどうぞ 次は操縦桿(かん)を握らせる

translation.en: He let me push a few levers. Seems like a nice guy.
translation.ja: レバーを押しただけ いい人だね

translation.en: - This is Multisani. - Oh, my gosh.
translation.ja: この子はムルティサニ

translation.en: I wanted to name this one Sadie.
translation.ja: セイディと名づけたかったの

translation.en: - She does kinda look like Grandma. - Right?
translation.ja: おばあちゃんに似てる

translation.en: You know, I haven't seen you do that in a long time.
translation.ja: そんなお前は久々に見た

translation.en: If I've learned anything here, it's to not get too attached.
translation.ja: 執着しないことを学んだ

translation.en: Not everything has to end badly.
translation.ja: 悪い結末ばかりじゃない

translation.en: It's not gonna end, 'cause it never really started.
translation.ja: 結末どころか始まってもない
じきに消える　みんなそうだ

translation.en: Okay, everyone, let's take a picture together. Let's take a Christmas picture!
translation.ja: クリスマスの写真を 撮りましょう

translation.en: On three, everyone say Merry Christmas, all right? Ready?
translation.ja: ３つ数えたら “メリークリスマス”と

translation.en: I think I just found next year's Christmas card.
translation.ja: 来年のカードに使うわ

translation.en: That beats the one we took in August.
Well, it was really nice of your father to send you. How's he doing?
translation.ja: パパに感謝しなきゃね 元気なの？

translation.en: He's okay, I guess. Got an apartment near the office.
translation.ja: たぶんね 職場近くに引っ越した

translation.en: The usual,  working, schmoozing clients. All that fun stuff.
translation.ja: 平常運転さ 仕事に顧客の接待 楽しそうだ

translation.en: You know, I get why you don't want to come back.
translation.ja: 帰りたくなくなるよね

translation.en: You and Dad never really liked the same things.
translation.ja: 夫婦共通の趣味もなかった

translation.en: The truth is, I'm surprised you stayed together as long as you did.
translation.ja: 今までもったのが驚きだ

translation.en: it wasn't bad. It was just...
translation.ja: そうじゃない ただ…

translation.en: Remember when we brought home that stray dog, and Dad made us give him away?
translation.ja: 前に犬を飼うの 父さんに反対された

translation.en: Well, now you get to keep that stray dog.
Yeah, you know, Comet, Cupid, Blixen.
translation.ja: サンタのトナカイだ ブリッゼンとか

translation.en: I don't usually let people peek at my doodles.
translation.ja: いつもは人に見せない

translation.en: Many times, even after they're done.

translation.ja: 本当はブリッツェンよ
ルドルフ ダッシャー ダンサー
プランサー ヴィクセン
コメット キューピッド ドンナー ブリッツェン

translation.en: They teach you that in vet school?

translation.ja: それは？ エッグノッグ

translation.en: Yeah, I've heard it called that.
I don't usually say that about humans.
And while we're in the Christmas spirit, I should say that it hasn't been completely awful having you here either.
translation.ja: クリスマスだから 君も そう目障りじゃない

translation.en: You know, you're really not as terrible as I thought you were at first.
translation.ja: あなたも第一印象ほど 悪くなかった

translation.en: - not mistletoe. - That is African mistletoe.
And even though we're in Africa, we still celebrate the same worldwide mistletoe traditions.
translation.ja: アフリカでも ヤドリギの伝統は尊重してる
ああ ニューヨーク

translation.en: You know, Freshman year is always a huge adjustment. I'm sure it's going to get better.
translation.ja: １年生は大変だけど そのうち楽しくなる

translation.en: Yeah, it's been a bit rough with the distance.
translation.ja: 遠距離恋愛は厳しくて

translation.en: I don't mean to pry, but--
translation.ja: うるさいでしょうけど…

translation.en: Please tell me those aren't what I think they are.
translation.ja: まさか ここでもあれを？

translation.en: Of course they are! How else am I supposed to measure an elephant?
translation.ja: 他にどうやって ゾウの背丈を測るの？

translation.en: Come here. I'm so happy you're here.
translation.ja: 来てくれてうれしいわ

translation.en: It's the best Christmas present ever.
Hey! Are you still Christmas shopping?
translation.ja: まだクリスマスの買い物？

translation.en: I'm having Christmas lunch with Tabitha. Why aren't you with us?
translation.ja: 一緒にランチをしたかったわ

translation.en: I just could not face that empty apartment for the holidays.
He's here with me! He flew in yesterday to surprise me!
translation.ja: 昨日 サプライズで 来てくれたの

translation.en: This year, it's gonna be Christmas in Africa.
translation.ja: アフリカでクリスマスよ

translation.en: And what is Christmas in Africa?
translation.ja: そっちではどう祝うの？

translation.en: Well, I can't speak for the whole continent, but here at the elephant orphanage,
translation.ja: 他は知らないけど この保護園では―

translation.en: they celebrate all week, and there's no shopping involved.
translation.ja: 丸１週間お祝いして 買い物はなし

translation.en: - You are coming home right? - Yeah,
Well, you know what they say here?
translation.ja: こっちの人は こう言う

translation.en: they say, When the time is right.
translation.ja: こっちの人は こう言う “その時が来たら”

translation.en: Okay. Now I'm really starting to worry.
translation.ja: 本気で心配になってきた
アフリカでクリスマスか

translation.en: Time goes so slowly out here.
translation.ja: 慌ただしさとは無縁ね

translation.en: I'm so proud of you, too!
translation.ja: あなたも自慢の息子よ

translation.en: Well, I hope you still feel that way after I tell you what I'm gonna tell you.
translation.ja: 今から話すことを聞いても そう思うかな

translation.en: I'm really not into the business major.
translation.ja: 大学のことだけど… 経営学は合わない

translation.en: That's okay. What do you want to study?
translation.ja: じゃ 何を学びたいの？

translation.en: Now, see, that's not exactly it.
College is a waste of time for me.
I wanna make music. That's what I'm passionate about.
translation.ja: 僕は音楽に情熱を注ぎたい

translation.en: And please don't say anything to Dad, I haven't told him yet.
translation.ja: 父さんにはまだ黙ってて

translation.en: you cannot just drop out of college.
Well, you left for Africa with no return date, and look at you! You're happy!
translation.ja: 母さんはアフリカで幸せに

translation.en: Yeah, because I'm not waiting 20 years to do what I really wanna do.
translation.ja: 僕は20年も 夢を我慢したくない

translation.en: Well, my kid kinda got me out of the Christmas spirit.
translation.ja: 息子のせいで気分が台なし

translation.en: Oh. He's leaving tomorrow. Why don't you wait till then to miss him?
translation.ja: 別れは明日 惜しめばいい

translation.en: The problem is that he just announced that he's going to drop out of school,
translation.ja: あの子 大学をやめると 言い出したの

translation.en: play in a band, move in with his friends, and then write his own music in Starbucks.
translation.ja: バンドを組んで 友達と暮らすって

translation.en: Isn't that how The Beatles started?
You don't understand! You don't even have kids!
translation.ja: 子供がいない人には 分からない

translation.en: I'm just... I'm terrible company. I'm gonna go to bed.
translation.ja: 今の私は最悪ね　もう寝るわ

translation.en: All right, I want you to think about what I said, okay?
translation.ja: 昨日の話 よく考えてね

translation.en: I love you, Mom, but I'm not changing my mind.
translation.ja: でも もう決めたんだ

translation.en: - I love you so much. - I love you, too.
I'll text you when I land in Newark.
He's a good kid. He's gonna be fine.
I just feel guilty, you know?
I feel like I should've been there for him. But I was here.
translation.ja: 我が子の大事な時期に ここにいた

translation.en: - I never meant to stay this long. -
You can't run away forever. So they tell me.
translation.ja: 永遠には逃げられない

translation.en: I know. You're gonna miss me.
- That's not even what I was gonna say. - Oh, you're not gonna miss me?
translation.ja: そうじゃない 寂しくない？

translation.en: It's okay, 'cause I'm gonna miss you.
I was going to surprise you with a Christmas present,
translation.ja: 驚かせようと思ったけど―

translation.en: but now I'm not so sure.
translation.ja: 驚かせようと思ったけど― 私のほうが驚いた

translation.en: I don't think I've seen you paint anything but scenery.
translation.ja: 風景以外は初めてよね

translation.en: Thought I'd give something else a try.
How's that turning out for you?
So I guess not very well.
People come to see the animals, and then they go home.
translation.ja: みんな動物を見て帰る

translation.en: Come to Cape Town with me. We'll see out the holidays there.
translation.ja: ケープタウンに行かない？

translation.en: Whatever this is we've been doing...
translation.ja: 俺たちの関係が何であれ―

translation.en: Well, I regret to inform you
translation.ja: それなら 残念だけど―

translation.en: that the board has decided to terminate funding as of the new year.
translation.ja: 来年度の支援は打ち切りね

translation.en: This isn't about us. This is about the elephants.
translation.ja: ゾウとは関係ないことだ

translation.en: It's not about the bloody elephants for me.
translation.ja: ゾウなんてどうでもいい

translation.en: - Jonathan will drive you. - Oh. You're not gonna--
translation.ja: ジョナサンが送る あなたは？

translation.en: I have some tourists I have to fly out.
Well, you'd better be nice to those tourists, 'cause you just don't know how they're gonna turn out.
translation.ja: 観光客には優しくしてね 長居するかも

translation.en: - - I don't know what to say.

translation.ja: なあ ニューヨーク

translation.en: If you come back here, I'll be here.
translation.ja: 俺はずっとここにいる

translation.en: I guess I did see that one coming.
No. She's not returning my calls.
translation.ja: 何も　電話も無視だ

translation.en: I'm thinking of flying down there, talking to the board myself, see if I can get them to change their mind.
translation.ja: 俺が財団に行って 理事会を説得してみる

translation.en: You remember what happened last time?
I will think before I speak this time.
translation.ja: 今度はよく考えてから 物を言うよ

translation.en: I really love animals, and I miss working with them so much.
translation.ja: 動物が大好きで 獣医に復帰したいんです

translation.en: Elephants?  Well, that's a little different.
translation.ja: ゾウの診療とは珍しい

translation.en: Yes, I know they're not your typical clientele,
translation.ja: ここではあまり 診ないでしょうけど

translation.en: but I'm also familiar with antelope, rhino
translation.ja: ここではあまり 診ないでしょうけど レイヨウやサイ サルにも詳しいんです
レイヨウやサイ サルにも詳しいんです

translation.en: Thank you. Everyone calls me Dr. Kate.
I mean, you'd be getting a college degree, and you'd be doing something you love.
translation.ja: 好きなことをして 大卒資格も取れる

translation.en: I dunno. It's not really what I had in mind.
translation.ja: どうかな　気乗りしない

translation.en: And it'd be really good for your musical career.
translation.ja: 音楽の仕事にも有利だし

translation.en: I dunno. It's a lot to think about.
translation.ja: いろいろ考えたいんだ

translation.en: Can I have a night to sleep on it?
Of course, of course! Let's go get lunch.
translation.ja: もちろんよ　まずはランチを

translation.en: He stays in college, but he studies something that he loves.
translation.ja: 大学で好きなことを学べる

translation.en: You're really okay with our son being...
translation.ja: いいのか？　息子が将来―
それがあの子の望みよ

translation.en: I mean, when else is he going to get to try it?
translation.ja: それがあの子の望みよ 50歳になって 嫌々 仕事していたら？

translation.en: When he's 50 and he's in a job that he hates?
translation.ja: 50歳になって 嫌々 仕事していたら？

translation.en: he is never going to be you.
translation.ja: ルークは あなたとは違う

translation.en: We just have to help him be himself.
translation.ja: 親にできるのは応援よ
ハッピーニューイヤー！

translation.en: I know I said I wouldn't worry, but...
translation.ja: 心配しないと言ったけど…

translation.en: Good.  And how are you? How is everyone?
translation.ja: よかった あなたたち人間も元気？
残念だが そうでもない

translation.en: Derek wouldn't want me to say anything. But...
translation.ja: 知らせたくないようだが…

translation.en: Derek got some emergency funding from another foundation,
translation.ja: デレクが活動資金を集めてる

translation.en: but if we don't figure out something long- term and soon,
translation.ja: だが長期的支援の めどが立たないと―

translation.en: I don't think we'll last much past June of next year.
translation.ja: 次の６月まで もたないかも

translation.en: Well, no, no, no, that can't happen!
Looks like we don't need the foundation.
Not for a very long time.
At least not until next Christmas.
translation.ja: 次のクリスマスまで確実だ

translation.en: - How are you? - Hi, how are you?
All right, what is this? Is it a thorn?
translation.ja: これは何？ トゲかしら

translation.en: - - King Charles in room needs a teeth cleaning,
Wait, that is the third time this week!

translation.ja: こんにちは　また来たのね

translation.en: And may I say that's a very nice sweater!
translation.ja: ステキなセーターだわ

translation.en: And a refill on her antidepressants.
translation.ja: それに抗うつ剤の補充も

translation.en: Just give me one second, okay?
translation.ja: 少し待っててもらえます？
少し待っててもらえます？ ほんの少しだけ

translation.en: Is that how we're doing things now?
Well, it works. And the elephants like it.
translation.ja: 便利だし ゾウも喜んでる

translation.en: Maybe I should get you a bottle, cheer you up a bit.
translation.ja: お前もミルクで元気出せ

translation.en: I have a pick- up. You want anything?
Derek! Are we up for some poker tonight?
translation.ja: 今夜 ポーカーはどうだ

translation.en: I wish I could. I have an early flight.
translation.ja: 明日 早いからやめとくよ

translation.en: Taking some tourist into the bush.
Two weeks ago, I sold my apartment.
Two days ago, I bought a one- way ticket.
And two minutes ago, I walked in here after a very long journey.
translation.ja: ２分前 長旅の末に ここに着いたの

translation.en: Well, I hope you're ready for another one.

translation.ja: “ルークへ 式に来てくれてありがとう”

translation.en: - - Manu, I'm really gonna miss you.
translation.ja: マヌ 寂しくなるわ

translation.en: I'm gonna think about you every day,
translation.ja: 毎日 あなたを思ってる

translation.en: and I want you to know not to be scared out there.
translation.ja: 野生に戻っても あなたなら大丈夫

translation.en: You're gonna do great because you are smart
translation.ja: うまくやっていけるわ だって頭がいいし 強いし―
だって頭がいいし 強いし―

translation.en: and you are brave. Okay, baby?
Go live your life, all right?
And now I let him go just like that?
translation.ja: あっけなく行っちゃったわね
